document.full_text: a philadelphia firefighter who posed shirtless for a fundraising calendar called "the nation's bravest" said on wednesday he was surprised it sparked an angry reaction that nearly cost him his elite post.
document.title: shirtless pose gets philadelphia firefighter in trouble
